root.name: Jam Sessions 2
root.description: OverviewJam Sessions 2, again developed by Plato and published by Ubisoft, features new songs to play and learn, an editor which allows players to make their own songs and include them in the set list and also a DSi-specific feature that enables the use of the Nintendo DSi camera to apply a WAH WAH effect to the guitar. Unlike the first game, Jam Sessions 2 was only released in North America.Set ListThe game includes songs by REM, Heart, The Ramones, The Clash, Doobie Brothers, Plain White-Tâ€™s, The Black Crowes, The Pixies and more.

similar_games.game: Guitar Hero On Tour: Modern Hits
